snippet: “Sentimental Value,” an exhibition of garments purchased on eBay alongside stories the sellers shared in their listings, reveals the profound meaning we attach to our clothes.
lead_paragraph: “Sentimental Value,” an exhibition of garments purchased on eBay alongside stories the sellers shared in their listings, reveals the profound meaning we attach to our clothes.

headline.main: The Hilarious, Poignant Humanity of eBay Auction Listings
